alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:08PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Elbert County through 345 PM MDT... At 308 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Elbert, or 31 miles north of Colorado Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elbert, Elizabeth, Kiowa and Ponderosa Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
